2.title: THIS CATEGORY IS MURDER

6.title: BERNINI
clues: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows a geometric diagram on the monitor.) Bernini said his plan of a large oval connected to a trapezoidal space for the piazza of this building was meant to evoke the arms of the Church embracing its faithful

Bernini's sculpture of this French king set the standard for royal portraits for 100 years
DAILY DOUBLE
Bernini's Fountain of the Four Rivers represents rivers of 4 continents: the Ganges, the Plata, the Danube & this one
In his masterpiece The Ecstasy of this Carmelite nun of Avila, Bernini crafted cascading marble drapery

10.title: LET ME MAKE A PREDICTION
